description: Try our easy to follow Thai Style Pumpkin Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Pumpkin,Low sugar,Sesame free,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai Style Pumpkin Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs mild thai red curry paste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large pan. Cook onion and curry paste over medium heat until onion is soft. Add pumpkin and stock. Bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes until pumpkin is very soft. Cool slightly.
pur√©e in a food processor or with a handheld blender until smooth.
Return to pan and add coconut cream and lime juice. Reheat over low heat.
Spoon into bowls. Sprinkle with coriander.
